title: TFR Ep. 630: Triangle Of Sadness, Werewolf By Night, The Howling, Werewolf Marathon Awards
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt book a cruise with the rich and decadent to visit the scenic ‘Triangle Of Sadness’! Filled with a Russian oligarchs, Weapons Manufacturers, and possibly the worst of all, Social Media Influencers, is this trip with the 2 & half hour experience? Then as a treat, it’s ‘Werewolf By Night’! Disney+’s Halloween special is a throwback to the classic Universal monster movies! But is it more a trick? The Werewolf Marathon wraps with Joe Dante’s 80’s cult classic ‘The Howling’.  Dee Wallace goes on a retreat after experiencing some severe workplace trauma, to find it hides a terrible secret. There’s the scintillating review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week. Finally, Matt and Chris close out the show with the Werewolf Marathon Awards!

00:00-13:08: Intro/Triangle Of Sadness

13:09-22:19: Werewolf By Night

22:20-36:13: Physical Media Picks

36:14-46:52: The Howling

46:53-55:19: Werewolf Marathon Awards

55:20-58:31: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
